hero_title: The Future of Scrap and Industrial Waste Management
hero_description: A simple platform connecting businesses to trade industrial scrap and waste efficiently.
testimonial1_description: Alkhorda made it so easy to sell our excess scrap materials. Fast, efficient, and reliable – highly recommended! user avatar
testimonial2_description: Alkhorda est la première plateforme au Maroc dédiée à l'achat et à la vente efficaces de ferrailles et déchets industriels. Elle révolutionne le secteur du recyclage en connectant facilement les entreprises, contribuant ainsi à promouvoir la durabilité et à réduire les déchets.
testimonial3_description: Alkhorda est la première plateforme au Maroc dédiée à l'achat et à la vente efficaces de ferrailles et déchets industriels. Elle révolutionne le secteur du recyclage en connectant facilement les entreprises, contribuant ainsi à promouvoir la durabilité et à réduire les déchets.
why.description: One platform for all your needs
why.title: Why Alkhorda
about.description: Alkhorda is a leading platform in Morocco that specializes in the buying and selling of industrial scrap and waste materials. Our mission is to connect businesses efficiently, enabling them to trade excess materials in a simple, transparent, and sustainable manner. By offering an easy-to-use online marketplace, we help companies minimize waste, promote recycling, and optimize their resource management. Whether you're looking to offload unused materials or source valuable resources, KhordaMa is your trusted partner for all industrial scrap and waste needs.
why.description1: Turn waste into resources with KhordaMa sustainable recycling platform.
why.description2: Get live updates on prices and availability for timely decisions.
why.description3: Connect with verified buyers and sellers for secure transactions.
why.description4: Advanced algorithms to connect you with the right seller.
why.description5: Utilise advanced technology to enhance transactions and boost returns.
why.description6: Our team ensures smooth support throughout every transaction.
why.description7: Simplify scrap trading with our easy-to-use industrial platform.

contact.description: Get all the information that you need by contacting us
newsletter.title: Join Our Daily Newsletter
newsletter.description: the simple way connect with us
no_product_found: No products found matching your criteria.
faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.
faq.question1: How does the KhordaMa platform work?
faq.answer1: Alkhorda is an online platform that connects businesses looking to sell their industrial waste and scrap materials with those seeking to purchase them. Simply register, post your materials or search for what you need, and conduct secure transactions.
faq.question2: What types of materials can I buy or sell on KhordaMa?
faq.answer2: You can trade all types of industrial waste and scrap materials: ferrous and non-ferrous metals, plastic waste, paper-cardboard, used industrial equipment, and many other recyclable materials.
faq.question3: How can I ensure the quality and reliability of transactions?
faq.answer3: All our users are verified, we provide a rating and review system, and our teams regularly monitor listings. Additionally, we offer dedicated support to guide every transaction.
faq.question4: Are there any fees for using the platform?
faq.answer4: Registration and browsing are free. We only apply a small commission on successful transactions, which allows us to maintain a quality platform and optimal customer support.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.section1.content1: KhordaMa respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.section1.content2: By using our platform, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacy.section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
privacy.section3.item1: Provide and improve our platform services
privacy.section3.item2: Facilitate transactions between buyers and sellers
privacy.section3.item3: Communicate with you about your account
privacy.section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
privacy.section4.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information only with your consent, for legal reasons, or with trusted service providers.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Data Security
privacy.section5.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, modification, or deletion.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.section6.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or transfer your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.contact.title: 7. Contact Us
privacy.contact.content: For any questions about this privacy policy, contact us:
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.important_notice: IMPORTANT: KhordaMa is only an intermediary platform. We are not responsible for products, their quality, or quantity sold by vendors.
terms.section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.section1.content1: By accessing and using KhordaMa, you agree to be bound by these terms of service.
terms.section1.content2: If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.
terms.section2.title: 2. Service Description
terms.section2.content1: KhordaMa is an online platform that connects buyers and sellers of industrial waste and scrap materials. We facilitate transactions but are not party to agreements between users.
terms.section3.title: 3. IMPORTANT LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
terms.section3.content1: KhordaMa acts solely as an intermediary between buyers and sellers. We are NOT responsible for:
terms.section3.item1: The quality, condition, or compliance of materials sold
terms.section3.item2: Actual quantities delivered versus those advertised
terms.section3.item4: Commercial disputes between buyers and sellers
terms.section3.item5: Damages resulting from transactions between users
terms.section3.content2: Transactions occur directly between users at their own responsibility.
terms.section4.title: 4. User Obligations
terms.section4.item2: Comply with local laws regarding waste trade
terms.section4.item4: Not post fraudulent or misleading content
terms.section5.title: 5. Fees and Payments
terms.section5.content1: Registration and browsing on KhordaMa are free.
terms.section5.content2: We charge a commission on successful transactions to maintain and improve our platform.
terms.section6.title: 6. Termination
terms.section6.content1: You may close your account at any time by contacting us.
terms.section6.content2: We reserve the right to suspend or close accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section7.title: 7. Modifications
terms.section7.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect upon posting on our platform.
terms.contact.title: 8. Contact
terms.contact.content: For any questions about these terms, contact us:
cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: Manage your cookie preferences for a personalized experience.
cookies.essential.title: Essential Cookies
cookies.essential.details: These cookies are essential for our platform to function. They enable navigation, security, and basic features.
cookies.analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
cookies.analytics.details: These cookies collect information about how you use our site to help us improve it.
cookies.marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
cookies.marketing.details: These cookies are used to show you relevant advertisements on other websites.
cookies.preferences.title: Preference Cookies
cookies.preferences.details: These cookies remember your preferences like language and display settings.
cookies.what_are_cookies.title: What are cookies?
cookies.what_are_cookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your experience by remembering your preferences.
cookies.how_we_use.title: How we use cookies
cookies.how_we_use.content: We use cookies to enhance our website's functionality, analyze usage, and personalize your experience.
cookies.contact.title: Questions about cookies
cookies.contact.content: For any questions about our use of cookies, contact us:
